subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
Starostin derives this from {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*rwak||leaf}}, and cites {{cog|bo|ཁྲོག་པོ||botanical term used of leaves standing round the stem scattered or alternately}}, {{cog|my|ရွက်}}, {{m|my|အရွက်||leaf}} as cognates. Compare also {{cog|kfk||rāgʻ|blue, green}}.

Cognate with {{zh-m|*菉|name of a plant of uncertain species}}. In modern times this character gave rise to {{zh-m|*氯|chlorine}}.
